scripts.lint: jshint lib/*.js bin/*.js test/*.js helpers/**/*.js; echo
scripts.all: dmd < test/fixture/module.json > test/expected/module.md; dmd < test/fixture/handbrake.json > test/expected/handbrake.md
scripts.html: cat test/fixture/globals.json | dmd --partial html/**/*.hbs --template tmp/docs.hbs > tmp/globals.html; cat test/fixture/handbrake.json | dmd --partial html/**/*.hbs --template tmp/docs.hbs > tmp/handbrake.html; cat test/fixture/module.json | dmd --partial html/**/*.hbs --template tmp/docs.hbs > tmp/module.html;
